name: Roy Tang
text: I'll admit I wasn't really considering the chat/toxicity aspect of it (that doesnt exist in Street Fighter)

source_obj.text: I'll admit I wasn't really considering the chat/toxicity aspect of it (that doesnt exist in Street Fighter)

replies.text: In general, PvE multiplayer is much less toxic. My experiences with Battleborn and ME3 PvE were quite pleasant. Still a chance of toxicity in large groups, like MMO raids.
